attributes.action: bring the police in to investigate for fraud and to give voters the power to force by-elections to remove expense cheat MPs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to rid this country of Corruption, voters who own this country should have the power to force by-elections to remove expense cheat MPs. The police should also be called in to investigate for fraud.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
